about_the_game:
SteamForge is an indie clicker game where players click on the anvil in their workshop to earn diamonds. With the diamonds you earn, you can open mysterious creatures that give you items. These items can be sold on the Steam Marketplace.

The goal of the game is simple: farm diamonds by clicking, open creatures for items, and sell them for profit. You will explore a virtual economy based on the Steam marketplace, where you can interact with other players and trade your items.

Main Features:

  • Clicker gameplay: Click the anvil to earn diamonds and open creatures that give you items.

  • Creatures and rare items: Discover creatures that provide valuable items that can be sold on the Steam Marketplace.

  • Simplicity and fun: The gameplay is easy to understand and highly addictive, perfect for short gaming sessions.

Step into the world where each click could bring you a new item to sell!
